original_text: I pray that all your enemies will die as Sisera died, Lord! But I pray that those who love you will shine brightly. May they be strong like the sun at dawn.’ After that, there was peace in Israel for 40 years. I pray that all your enemies will die as Sisera died, Lord!
korean_text: 여호와여 주의 원수들은 다 이와 같이 망하게 하시고 주를 사랑하는 자들은 해가 힘 있게 돋음 같게 하시옵소서 하니라 그 땅이 사십 년 동안 평온하였더라

sentences.original_text: I pray that all your enemies will die
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신의 모든 적들이 죽기를 기도합니다

sentences.original_text: But I pray that those who love you
May they be strong like the sun
After that, there was peace in Israel
I pray that all your enemies will die
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신의 모든 적들이 죽기를 기도합니다
